msbt.message: Surprised I'm up so early? Yeah, me too.I dreamed I was a rock star. The crowd was going nuts. I hit the first chord of my solo and BAM! Awake.Thing is, I feel super rested, sonow I gotta figure out what to do with all this extra day.
Sometimes I really want a taste of morning air, so I'll just stay up through the night.
The only reason I'm up is so I can check on my flowers.There's not enough coffee in the world to convince me that being awake this early is EVER a good idea.
Just feelin' a little more awake than usual right now, so I'm takin' a stroll. You a night too?
Can't sleep? It's alright. Try taking a walk. 's super peaceful at this hour.
I'm kind of a night by nature. I love how calm things get after the sun's down.
